item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S310-311)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S309-310)

summary.text: Strengthening the Visa Waiver Program to Secure America Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act regarding the visa waiver program to: (1) require current and new program countries to report on lost or stolen visas in order to participate in the program; (2) set a maximum 2% visa overstay rate for program countries; (3) require a reevaluation of program countries within one year; and (4) include arrival data in the required air entry and exit system and electronic travel authorization system.

bill.title: Strengthening the Visa Waiver Program to Secure America Act

item.title: Strengthening the Visa Waiver Program to Secure America Act
Strengthening the Visa Waiver Program to Secure America Act
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to modify the requirements for participation in the visa waiver program and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S310-311)

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
